00043     public function TableExists ( $table )
00056     {
00057         if ( $this->database == '' )
00058         // no database selected
00059         {
00060             $errs = new Errors();
00061 
00062             $errs->Add ( new BDDError ( BDDError::CONNECTION_NO_DB_SELECTED , 'No database selected.' ) );
00063             
00064             return $errs;            
00065         }
00066         else
00067         {
00068                 if ( ( $tableList = & $this->Query( 'SHOW TABLES FROM '.$this->database ) instanceof Errors ) )
00069             // query failed
00070             {
00071                 return $tableList;
00072             }
00073             else
00074             // search for table
00075             {
00076                                 foreach ( $tableList as $currentTable )
00077                                 {
00078                                         if ( $table == $currentTable->GetProperty( 'Tables_in_'.$this->database ) )
00079                     {
00080                         unset ( $tableList );
00081                         return True;
00082                     }
00083                 }
00084                                 
00085                 $errs = new Errors();
00086     
00087                 $errs->Add ( new BDDError ( BDDError::CONNECTION_TABLE_INEXISTANT , 'This table does not exist.' ) );
00088                 
00089                 return $errs;                 
00090             }
00091         }
00092     } //----- End of TableExists
00093     
00094         public function TableDescription ( $table )
00106     {
00107         if ( $this->database == '' )
00108         // no database selected
00109         {
00110             $errs = new Errors();
00111 
00112             $errs->Add ( new BDDError ( BDDError::CONNECTION_NO_DB_SELECTED , 'No database selected.' ) );
00113             
00114             return $errs;            
00115         }
00116         else
00117         {
00118                         $ressource = & $this->Query( 'DESCRIBE `'.$table.'`' );
00119                         
00120                 return $ressource;
00121         }
00122     } //----- End of TableDescription

00203     public function Open( $isPersistent )
00216     {
00217         if ( !$this->isConnected() ) 
00218         {
00219                         if ( $isPersistent == BDDConnection::CONNECTION_PERSISTENT )
00220                         {
00221                                 $connectFunction = 'mysql_pconnect';
00222                         }
00223                         else
00224                         {
00225                                 $connectFunction = 'mysql_connect';
00226                         }
00227                 
00228             if ( ($this->connection = @$connectFunction( $this->server , $this->username , $this->password )) )
00229             {
00230                 return NULL;
00231             }
00232             else
00233             {
00234                 // connexion échouée
00235                 $this->connection = NULL;
00236                 
00237                 $errs = new Errors();
00238     
00239                 $errs->Add ( new BDDError ( BDDError::CONNECTION_CANNOT_OPEN , 'Unable to open connection, please verify your login/password.' ) );
00240                 
00241                 return $errs;
00242             }
00243         }
00244         else
00245         {
00246             $errs = new Errors();
00247 
00248             $errs->Add ( new BDDError ( BDDError::CONNECTION_ALREADY_OPENED , 'Connection already opened.' ) );
00249             
00250             return $errs;
00251         }
00252     } //----- End of Open
00253     
00254     public function SetDatabase( $database ) 
00255     
00267     {
00268         if ( !$this->isConnected() )
00269         {
00270             // connexion inexistante
00271             $errs = new Errors();
00272 
00273             $errs->Add ( new BDDError ( BDDError::CONNECTION_CLOSED , 'Connection closed.' ) );
00274             
00275             return $errs;
00276         }
00277         else
00278         {
00279             if ( !@mysql_select_db ( $database , $this->connection ) )
00280             // change échoué
00281             {
00282                 $errs = new Errors();
00283     
00284                 $errs->Add ( new BDDError ( BDDError::CONNECTION_CANNOT_CHANGE_DB , 'Unable to change database : '.mysql_error( $this->connection ) ) );
00285                 
00286                 return $errs;
00287             }
00288             else
00289             {
00290                 $this->database = $database;
00291             
00292                 return NULL;
00293             }
00294         }
00295     } //----- End of SetDabase
00296     
00297     public function Query( $query )
00310     {
00311         if ( $this->database == '' )
00312         // no database selected
00313         {
00314             $errs = new Errors();
00315 
00316             $errs->Add ( new BDDError ( BDDError::CONNECTION_NO_DB_SELECTED , 'Aucune base de données sélectionnée' ) );
00317             
00318             return $errs;            
00319         }
00320         else
00321         {
00322             if ( ( $result = @mysql_query( $query , $this->connection ) ) === false ) 
00323             // query failed
00324             {
00325                 $errs = new Errors();
00326     
00327                 $errs->Add ( new BDDError ( BDDError::CONNECTION_QUERY_FAILED , 'La requete a échoué ('.$query.') : '.mysql_error( $this->connection ) ) );
00328                 
00329                 return $errs;
00330             }
00331             else
00332             {
00333                 $this->nombreRequetes++;
00334             
00335                                 // set in en BDDRecord
00336                                 
00337                                 $nouvellesRessources = new BDDRecordSet ( );
00338                                 
00339                                 while ( ($row = @mysql_fetch_assoc ( $result ) ) !== false )
00340                                 {
00341                                         $nouvellesRessources->Add ( new BDDRecord ( $row ) ) ;
00342                                 }
00343                                 
00344                                 @mysql_free_result ( $result ); // free memory
00345 
00346                 return $nouvellesRessources ;
00347             }
00348         }
00349     } //----- End of Query

00362     public function Close( )
00371     {
00372         if ( !$this->isConnected() || !@mysql_close( $this->connection ) )
00373         {
00374             // no connection
00375             $errs = new Errors();
00376 
00377             $errs->Add ( new BDDError ( BDDError::CONNECTION_CLOSED , 'Connexion déjà fermée' ) );
00378             
00379             return $errs;
00380         }
00381         else
00382         {
00383             $this->database = '';
00384         
00385             return NULL;
00386         }
00387     } //----- End of Close
00388     
00389     public function isConnected ( )
00397     {
00398         return ( $this->connection !== NULL && @mysql_stat ( $this->connection ) !== NULL );
00399     } //----- End of isConnected
00400     
00401 //-------------------------------------------- Constructeurs - destructeur
00402     public function __construct( $server = '' , $username = '' , $password = '' )
00412     {
00413             if ( ! function_exists( 'mysql_connect' ) )
00414             {
00415                 die('PHP does not support MySQL');
00416             }
00417             
00418             $this->connection = NULL;
00419             
00420             $this->server = $server;
00421             $this->username = $username;
00422             $this->password = $password;
00423             
00424             $this->database = '';
00425             
00426             $this->nombreRequetes = 0;
00427     } //----- End of contructor
